item.description:
Please note the time is now 6:30 and the meeting is being held at Bill's house. I will meet you at the Derryfield in Manchester, NH at 6:00 on request. It's very close to Bill's house, or you can send Bill an e-mail and ask for his address. (I'm just protecting his privacy!)

This is a healthy food potluck, so please bring something to share! (Or $5 to contribute)

If you sign up for a meeting and find you can't attend, please change your response to "No" (even at the very last minute!)

People got turned away last time who could have taken the 'no show' spots. :-)

We've very quickly turned into a supportive group of positive friends- this is awesome!
item.how_to_find_us: I'll e-mail the address to members who respond 'Yes" to this meeting

group.name: Abundance, Empowerment and the Law of Attraction

item.name: Abundance & Empowerment Potluck Dinner
